forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 54F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High around 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 58F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 51F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 48F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers, with increasing winds in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low near 45F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 53F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.
